CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound iron
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: To compound iron is to become an anchor. Limbs turn leaden, the body impossibly heavy â€” yet every step channels mass into the metalmind. With enough time, the Allomancer can store the weight of mountains, ready to unleash crushing force at will.
